thread.section_title: Energia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energia | energia.ie
thread.title: L Meegan

author: L Meegan
title: L Meegan
text: I think there are a fantastic company to deal with ... they have a Brillrant online service, which is so easy to use .. showing you all the time if your not sure by video .., the online chat service is with you a once too .... just find everything with them is very very good ., you can view your bill all the time, send in meter reading and check your next bill .., very very pleased I made the switch To Energy they look after the new and Old customer...,,
